archimate:DataObject.name: CompositeSecVulScoringMetricDefn
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A type of SecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefn that is formed by aggregating other SecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefns; which may be Composite or Atomic SecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefns. Notes: A Base Score Metric which is made up of Base Exploitability and Base Impact; Base Exploitability made up of Acess Vector; Authentication; and so forth.
